Uses of Interface
com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.Curve

  • Packages that use Curve 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.curve
    Market data functions used for building curves and related market data types.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.scenario.curve
    Market data filters and perturbations that apply to curves and related market data types.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.curve
    Definitions of curves.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.curve.perturb
    Curve perturbations.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.id
    Package containing IDs that identify items of market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.key
    Package containing keys that identify items or market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.market.view
    Package containing views of market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.pricer.rate
    Calculators for rates instruments, such as Forward Rate Agreement (FRA) and interest rate swap.
